name: GigaGal
description:
#GigaGal

A simple platformer where your goal is to get through each level while trying to maximize your score.

GigaGal is a game I made while learning how to work with LibGDX. It is originally based of the game of the same name that is made during the Udacity 406 course, I tweaked/re-coloured most of the sprites and added a bunch of features on top of the prototype I made when going through the udacity course.

Github: https://github.com/6money/GigaGal
